comments.en:
The Samsung CLX-3185 (USB) and CLX-3185FW (network) is color laser multifunction printer with a 2010 street price of $225/$550 USD.

This printer is supported by the foo2qpdl open software printer driver.

Only the printer function is supported by this driver.

Consumables: Separate toner cartridges black (1500 prints, ~$54), yellow/magenta/cyan (1000 prints, ~$45 each), waste toner (5000 prints, ~$10), drum kit (24000 prints, ~$96)
